MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G73 postcode area of Rutherglen. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9am to install fault finding equipment at Broomieknowe Drive substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.36am on 26th April 2021.
